title: Zephyr Wave Wall Range Hood
description:
The Wave looks great with any number of décor styles, from transitional to modern, and the elegant tilt lends a slim profile to this kitchen workhorse. Ingenious dual capture zones ensure a smoke and debris-free kitchen. Offering a glowing tri-level LED light strip, and a choice of black or white glass and an optional duct cover, the Wave is a true kitchen classic.

See our capture test video for examples of Wave in action. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F6ABRRt7DGI

Learn more at http://zephyronline.com/products/arc/wave_wall
